a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Average effective age of retirement for men, 1970 to 2018
Estimates are based on a weighted average of changes in labour force participation rates by age, for workers 40+
Data source: OECD (2018) - Database on Average Effective Retirement Age
Note: The estimate for each year corresponds to the 5-year interval leading up to that year (e.g. 1970 corresponds to period 1965-70)
